channel.title: Models make me disappear
channel.description: when ever i weild certain weapons that ive added with certain armor or capes, it makes my character invisible, why is this happening?

item.title: Models make me disappear
item.dc:creator: @runedsoul1 runedsoul1
item.description:
@runedsoul1 wrote:

If u can wield the weapon by it self, But when u put x pieces of equipment on… Its just because some servers don’t like customs…

my only advice is to not wield to many items with customs

Read full topic

item.title: Models make me disappear
item.dc:creator: @cdoggy cdoggy
item.description:
@cdoggy wrote:

This is due to the servers non-support of the models. You have to add the models into the server before they will work. To do this edit your Item.java file, and add the model number to the appropriate class.

Example:
Item: A green Amulet model number 123445

Add it to the Item.java here:

public static int amulets[] = { 10519, 10413, 11204, 11205, 1120611146, 11147, 11148, 11149, 11150, 11151, 11152, 11141, 6857, 6859, 6861, 6863, 1724, 1718, 6585, 86, 774, 87, 295, 421, 552, 589, 1478, 1692, 1694, 1696, 1698, 1700, 1702, 1704, 1706, 1708, 1710, 1712, 1725, 1727, 1729, 1731, 4021, 4081, 4250, 4677, 6040, 6041, 6208, 11274, 11275, 11276, 11273, 11941, 123445};
Notice the last number in the list is the Item number.

Then edit the Item.cfg file and add the item name, description and abilities there.

Read full topic
